markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impactful](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1062)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune thrums with pure magical energy. Weapons with the rune deal an additional 1d6 [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, you can choose to force the target to succeed at a DC 27 Fortitude save or be [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 5 feet away from you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Impactful
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Impactful (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The save DC is 37, and on a failed save, the foe is pushed 10 feet away from you.
name: Impactful (Greater)
